text: The 1971 Bexley Council election took place on 13 May 1971 to elect members of Bexley London Borough Council in London, England. The whole council was up for election and the Labour party gained overall control of the council. ==Background== ==Election result== ==Ward results== ==References== 1971 Category:1971 London Borough council elections
title: 1971 Bexley London Borough Council election
